alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jefferson and southwestern Gage Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Fairbury, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairbury and Jefferson County Fairgrounds around 500 PM CDT. Jansen around 505 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Endicott, Diller and Steele City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
